title: Best Neighborhood in NYC, 1bdrm/1 bath /Sept 1st
posting_body: ['Beautiful 1 bedroom apartment available Sept 1st.', ' For rent by owner.', "No broker's fee.", 'Description', '-10 foot high ceilings, hardwood floors, oversized windows with treetop view', '- Plenty of storage space', '- Kitchen:', 'Granite countertop / stainless steel appliances', '- Renovated Bathroom with Kohler and Grohe fixtures', '- Oversized and well-proportioned bedroom can easily accommodate a king sized bed and a sitting area.', '- Large closets in bedroom and hallway', '- Elevator building', '- Small dog under 15lb ok.', 'No cats.', 'Amenities', '- 24 Hour Doorman building', '-Tranquil Zen Courtyard w/grilling area', '- Laundry on every floor', '-Two short term "drop-off" parking spots', 'Nearby', '- 24 Hour Deli across the street', '-Run, walk or bike ride on the Hudson River Park Esplanade.', 'Fabulous dining and luxury shopping are steps away from Brookfield Place and the Westfield mall.', '-Walking distance to  Brookfield Place, Oculus, Whole Foods, Bed Bath, Target and Barnes and Noble.', '-Green space throughout Battery Park includes multiple dog runs, ballfields and beautiful planted sitting areas.', '- Nearby subways 1, R, W, 4, 5, J, M, NJ Path train', '- NY Waterways, MTA Bus', '- Free Connection Bus to Whole Foods, FIDI, And Seaport', 'Must have excellent credit', 'No Smokers', 'NO brokers, please.']
